channel.title: Gerber only on DIY zigbee devices
channel.description: Recent content in Gerber only on DIY zigbee devices

item.title: CO2 (carbon dioxide) Zigbee sensor
item.description: Carbon dioxide has a very negative effect on the human body and is a carcinogen. Being in a room with a high concentration of CO2 can cause weakness, drowsiness, headaches, and trouble concentrating. In this regard, it is necessary to monitor the CO2 level and take measures to reduce it.
